headline: HealthEdge Announces Successful Sale of LifeSync to Amphenol
summary: HealthEdge Investment Partners, LLC ("HealthEdge"), a lower middle market private equity fund focused on healthcare, announced today that it has completed the sale of LifeSync ("LifeSync" or the "Company"), a developer, manufacturer, and marketer of disposable and reusable patient monitoring devices and connections sold to hospitals and other high acuity settings. LifeSync was acquired by Amphenol (NYSE: APH), one of the world's largest providers of connectors, interconnect systems, antennas, se
